Producer: Matthew Crouch, Stephan Blinn, Richard J. Cook, Laurie Crouch
Synopsis: Born of slaves, a young Jewish woman named Hadassah (Tiffany Dupont) becomes part of the harem of powerful King Xerxes (Luke Goss). Simultaneously, a close adviser to the king hatches a plan to exterminate the Jews. Hadassah, now called Queen Esther, must find the courage to step forward and save her people from annihilation.
Title: One Night With the King
